org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuildWrapper.preScript:
#!/bin/bash
source /root/jenkins/jk_func.sh
if [ -z "$server_name" ]; then echo "Error: 没有选择服务器!" exit 1 fi
file_lock LINE_NO=$(grep -n "${server_name}:" $conf_file | awk -F ":" '{print $1}') echo $LINE_NO mod_branch $LINE_NO $GAME_BR $BANDIT_BR $GAME_CONF $BANDIT_CONF file_unlock
org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuildWrapper.postScript:
conf_file=~/jenkins/server_config.yaml cat $conf_file | grep $server_name -C 6
cd /mnt/slots/bandit-server && git remote update cd /mnt/slots/cc-server && git remote update cd /var/lib/docker/volumes/jenkins-data/_data && python update_server_list.py
curl 'https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=13aa551ba8a79265c4424316089cd31c4f479b0f685f3d5a503b0ab6a1a42ec7' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"msgtype": "text","text": {"content": "Jenkins-Server['"${server_name}"'] Change To Game['"${GAME_BR}"'] RPC['"${BANDIT_BR}"'] GAME_CONF['"${GAME_CONF}"'] BANDIT_CONF['"${BANDIT_CONF}"'] "}}'
source /root/jenkins/jk_func.sh ~/jenkins/analyze_log/analyze_err -url ${BUILD_URL}
